about.description: I'm João, a full stack developer with a long-standing background in design. It was through shapes, colors, and compositions that I learned to observe, test, build, and rebuild. Over time, I realized that programming isn’t all that different — it also involves choices, rhythm, structure, and intention.
about.description-2: I like to understand how things work, break ideas apart and rebuild them with logic. To me, development goes beyond writing code — it's about making choices around flow, structure, and experience. I aim to work on systems that are clear, useful, and well-organized, both inside and out.
about.description-3: Today I work with technologies like Laravel and Ruby on Rails, but more than the stack itself, I care about the solution as a whole. It's not always the fastest path, but it's almost always the most solid one.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.text: Code and design are both part of my craft. Sometimes they come together. Other times, they don’t — and that’s okay. What drives me is the desire to tell meaningful stories, to translate ideas into something that communicates, connects, and becomes an experience. Always with a focus on what truly matters: impact.
